text: DXVP (1476 kHz) El Radio Verdadero is an AM station owned by the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Zamboanga. The station's studio is located at Sacred Heart Center, RT Lim Blvd., Zamboanga City.Archdiocese of ZamboangaZamboanga lawmaker opposes Aquino impeachmentPress Club holds 1st mass media awardsRMN ZAMBOANGA HAY CHENE EL LIVE COVERAGE DEL PROCESSION Y PONTIFICAL MASS DEL FIESTA PILAR LUEGO TARDE ==References== Category:Catholic radio stations Category:Radio stations established in 1991 Category:Radio stations in Zamboanga City
title: DXVP
